      • markAsFinished

        public boolean markAsFinished()
        Marks the task as finished. This succeeds, if the task was previously in the state "RUNNING", otherwise it fails. Failure indicates that the task was either canceled, or set to failed.
        Returns:
        True, if the task correctly enters the state FINISHED.
